item.description:
Welcome to Wednesday Night Knitting: Special Edition!

This week Christine is going to do a demo and teach knitting baby hats in the round with double pointed needles (dpns).  If you've never tried knitting in the round with double pointed needles and have always wanted to try, this is the perfect time!  Just bring a set of size 6 double pointed needles.  Christine is bringing the yarn and the know-how to share :)

 

This is in addition to our regular meetup and there is no requirement to participate in the baby hat learning experience.  We just ask that if you are interested in learning about double pointed needles you let us know so Christine brings enough yarn.

 

We look forward to seeing you for chit chat, knitting, and a good evening :)
item.name: Wednesday Night Knitting: Special Edition
